reviews.review: Honeslty, one of the best directed and executed masterpieces. Character development, story line, acting, dialogue and visually stunning movies. I mean PERFECT!!!!! Great Job Marvel/Disney, will be giving you more of my money to watch it again..

Avenger's Infinity War is the culmination of the MCU, and while it may be exciting for fans of the series for tying up certain plot points and character developments, but  as its own it really fails as a film. Without context from the previous movies, it just falls flat. Personally, I have seen most of the previous films, and every time I watched one of them I felt less interested than the last. So in conclusion, Marvel fans will like the film, if you have no context for it and want to see what all the fuss is about, bow to your corporate overlords and watch all the previous films in order to understand what is even going on.

esse filme foi feito com muito carinho e muito bem pensado. efeitos lindos pequenas falhas mas nao nao a trabalha em nada na historia que ainda nao pode ser dita como boa ou ruim pois o final ainda ira sair, mas ate onde vemos nao ha erros de roteiro piadas bem colocadas e poucas piadas que mostra uma nova formula da marvel mas sem sair da formula por isso amei esse filme(um ep da uma serie de cinema).
Sacrifice has never been this meaningless.
Pretty decent, better than that trash film Black Panther. *Disintegrates away*
I want my money back terrible ending movie is ok in parts but drags on and. The ending leaves you waiting for a refund
Lots to take in here. Almost to much visually. Many questions to be answered, but leaves you wanting those answers.

It's breathtaking, you watch 2 hours of perfection, it makes you sad and happy at the same time the acyion have never felt more alive. The last 15 minutes made my heart felt empty inside, but then you look at the post credit scene and then joy fills my heart again

Spectacular!!  A top notch example of plot and dialogue writing.  Some how the writers were able to fit in almost all of the Avengers without the movie seeming too "saturated" with characters.  Good balance of humor and Thanos lived up to the hype!
